desc: This book constitutes the thoroughly revised selected papers from the 14th International Conference on Formal Aspects of Component Software, FACS 2017, held in Braga, Portugal, in October 2017.
title: Formal Aspects of Component Software: 14th International Conference, FACS 2017, Braga, Portugal, October 10-13, 2017, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
